summary: My second follower addition. A Breton female Combat Rogue.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=5][color=#a64d79][color=#e06666][size=6]
[/size][/color][/color][/size]
[size=5][color=#a64d79][color=#e06666][size=6]

[color=#c27ba0]Randi[/color]
[size=5]Breton[/size][/size][/color]
Class-Combat Rogue
Spells-Conjure Familiar,Flames. and Healing
Perks- Lightfoot and Muffled Movement
Levels with player- Level 4 to 80
Essential and Marriageable[/color][/size][/center]

[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#e69138][size=3]This is my second attempt to make another standalone follower. I took the face from my Ningheim character and made her a standard Breton female. She is also in Rverwood by the sawmill. This has been my favorite looking character and I decided to share with the world. Again if any issues are found or if you just want to leave a comment, please feel free to do so.

She is shorter than normal(.95). She also uses the UNP Skinny body by dimom99. Her weight is 0.( I like small women)lol.

Please post some screenshots so that I can see she is working correctly.

Thanks to everyone for trying her out. If I had a higher skill set I would do more to her like scripts,animations, and voice acting but at the moment I am ignorant to those aspects.lol


[/size][/color][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#00ffff][size=3]                                                     This mod can also be used in Skyrim Special Edition.[/size][/color][/font]
author: lewbob
